SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY Z.ORD_SEQ ASC) AS ROW_NUM , Z.* FROM ( SELECT D.DEPT_CODE , D.UP_DEPT_CODE , D.DEPT_NM , D.ORD_SEQ , D.COMPANY_CODE , USA.AUTH_ID AS USER_AUTH_ID , USA.AUTH_NM AS USER_AUTH_NM , MSA.AUTH_ID AS MGR_AUTH_ID , MSA.AUTH_NM AS MGR_AUTH_NM FROM T_DEPT D LEFT JOIN T_USER_AUTH UA ON D.DEPT_CODE = UA.DEPT_CODE LEFT JOIN T_MGR_AUTH MA ON D.DEPT_CODE = MA.DEPT_CODE LEFT JOIN T_USER_SYS_AUTH USA ON UA.AUTH_ID = USA.AUTH_ID LEFT JOIN T_MGR_SYS_AUTH MSA ON MA.AUTH_ID = MSA.AUTH_ID
) Z

SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM T_DEPT D LEFT JOIN T_USER_AUTH UA ON D.DEPT_CODE = UA.DEPT_CODE LEFT JOIN T_MGR_AUTH MA ON D.DEPT_CODE = MA.DEPT_CODE LEFT JOIN T_USER_SYS_AUTH USA ON UA.AUTH_ID = USA.AUTH_ID LEFT JOIN T_MGR_SYS_AUTH MSA ON MA.AUTH_ID = MSA.AUTH_ID
SELECT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM T_DEPT WHERE DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode} LIMIT 1 )
